synopsis.text: In 1863 Japan, orphan Nio dreams of changing the world for the better but struggles to find his path. When fate leads him to cross paths with Hijikata Toshizo and Okita Souji, two wandering samurai making a name for themselves in Kyoto, his life is forever altered. Though initially seen as troublemakers, Nio soon realizes the "Wolves of Mibu" operate by a strong moral code, protecting the helpless when no one else will. After the swordsmen rescue Nio and his sister Iroha from danger, Nio is inspired to join their cause. As he trains with the rogue band that will one day form the Shinsengumi, Nio bears witness to a tide of betrayal and violence threatening to wash over Japan. With the nation on the brink of monumental upheaval, Nio and the Wolves of Mibu find themselves at the heart of the action. Though the times ahead will challenge their skills and convictions, bonded by justice and brotherhood, Nio discovers with his blade and the Wolves at his side, he may finally have the power to carve out the better world he always envisioned.
